description:
If you live in or around Kansas City, Missouri, and you suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions, you can turn to the legal professionals at Fowler Pickert Eisenmenger Norfleet for the exceptional, effective advocacy and support you deserve.

Serving plaintiff personal injury clients throughout the surrounding regions of Missouri and Kansas for more than 25 years, our attorneys possess in-depth knowledge of the intricacies of personal injury law, and we have achieved unprecedented success fighting for the rights and entitlements of those we have served.

Over the course of our history, we have recovered numerous six- and seven-figure settlements and awards on behalf of clients, earning our reputation as one of the region's top personal injury practices. Offering a full level of support, we promise to do whatever we can to ensure you receive the proper medical treatment you need while helping you secure the finances to cover your medical bills, lost wages and other associated expenses.

No matter the cause of your claim, if the accident was not your fault or if the incident arose from another party's poor judgment, you have the right to reclaim all of the damages you incurred. We want to be your voice during your time of need, and we will not require a fee from you unless we secure compensation on your behalf.

By contacting Fowler Pickert Eisenmenger Norfleet as soon as possible and taking advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation, you can discover why so many across the region have trusted us to help them obtain justice in the wake of a preventable tragedy.
